articles.title: 62 House Republicans and Josh Hawley Voted Against Bill to Fight Asian American Hate Crime - Newsweek
articles.description: Speaker Pelosi said on the House floor: "The COVID-19 Hate Crimes Bill will strengthen our defenses against any anti-AAPI violence, speeding our response to hate crime."
articles.content: The COVID–19 Hate Crimes Act passed the House Tuesday by a 364-62 vote. All 62 votes against the bill were cast by Republican members of Congress. The bill passed the Senate passed 94-1 last month, w… [+2734 chars]

articles.title: Ancient horse DNA reveals gene flow between Eurasian and North American horses - Science Daily
articles.description: A new study of ancient DNA from horse fossils found in North America and Eurasia shows that horse populations on the two continents remained connected through the Bering Land Bridge, moving back and forth and interbreeding multiple times over hundreds of thou…
